articles.title: New ‘hidden’ gene in COVID-19 virus identified - National Herald
articles.description: Researchers have identified a new “hidden” gene in SARS-CoV-2, the virus responsible for COVID-19, that may have contributed to its unique biology and pandemic potential
articles.content:
"Knowing that overlapping genes exist and how they function may reveal new avenues for coronavirus control, for example through antiviral drugs."
